address.docs:
**, int**: The I²C address of the driver. Defaults to `0x40`.

*See also: [ES7210](https://esphome.io/components/audio_adc/es7210.html#configuration-variables)*

bits_per_sample.docs:
**, enum**: The bit depth of the audio samples. One of `16bit`, `24bit` or `32bit`. Defaults to `16bit`.

*See also: [ES7210](https://esphome.io/components/audio_adc/es7210.html#configuration-variables)*

i2c_id.docs:
The ID of the [I²C bus](https://esphome.io/components/i2c.html#i2c) the ES7210 is connected to.

*See also: [ES7210](https://esphome.io/components/audio_adc/es7210.html#configuration-variables)*

mic_gain.docs:
**, enum**: The gain applied to the ADC microphones. One of `0DB`, `3DB`, `6DB`, `9DB`, `12DB`, `15DB`, `18DB`, `21DB`, `24DB`, `27DB`, `30DB`, `33DB`, `34.5DB`, `36DB`, or `37.5DB`. Defaults to `24DB`.

*See also: [ES7210](https://esphome.io/components/audio_adc/es7210.html#configuration-variables)*

sample_rate.docs:
**, positive integer**: I2S sample rate. Defaults to `16000`.

*See also: [ES7210](https://esphome.io/components/audio_adc/es7210.html#configuration-variables)*
